attributes.action: Help keep Burberry in Wales and stop making British clothes abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Burberry are planning to close its factory in the south wales valleys and transfer production to China where they pay people miniscule amounts of money to make their garments. Burberry is a british brand made in britain help us keep it that way. Another 300 jobs are under threat in a low income deprived part of wales. Major celebrities have joined the cause please suport us and stop this happening now.
